body:
Hello everyone!
This is DiamondPorkchop3!
I made a YouTube account!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgOWy6weEhjYi0tFLtbzosA
I will upload videos someday,
and add channel art and all that stuff.
Please subscribe, it means so much to me!
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Please support me in every way! :D
~DiamondPorkchop3
I'll do let's plays 'n' stuff.
Mostly minecraft
